website_summaries.verdict: The fifth-generation Apple Watch is a winner. It’s got an always-on retina display and improved health features like heart sensors.
pros: The always-on screen delivers, and battery life is still solid
The built-in compass makes it easy to find your way, especially with on-board GPS
Swimproof model lets you wear it anywhere
cons: The new 44mm size is quite big and takes some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think. Just buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Apple Watch device and have to say, blew my mind away. Beautiful peace of technology that makes you think of all the great things that have come with the age of technology.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is average. not a two day battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is maximum of 1.5 day. If you wear it all-day , You can't track your sleep. You have to charge it again before using.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad Chattikkal

customer_reviews.title: The fastest smart watch!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with this smart watch. Mainly wanted something which could track my heart rate but ECG function (Yes, ECG) attracted me the most. This watch superb for someone who wants their heart rate to be tracked regularly. Has a lot of in app functions. This watch has an always on display option with great analog clock interface. Battery is just superb, did my first charge after over a week of extensive use. I even use it for my calls! I would highly recommend this watch over the android ones, the only downside is that this watch only works with apple otherwise all the android users would have been wearing this!
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I waited for the series 5
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, love how the screen stays awake but it does kill the battery. You need to charge overnight, every night. I’ve now purchased a charging dock to go with. You can voice note back, answer calls, quick replies if you’re in the shower and can’t answer. It’s a lot more accurate for exercising than a Fitbit too. My brother is a wheelchair user and I saw you can even say you are so, therefore I’m sure it will track activity much better. Very smart!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: Watch was fairly easy to set up- just hold it next to your phone. However, I instantly noticed that watch was buggy and slow to respond. Also the always on feature wasn’t working. This is a big selling point for the series 5 so to not have it working was a big let down. Tried installing again and updating but no luck. After jumping through hoops I was able to return the watch for a refund. Even if it had worked properly I don’t think it’s a massive upgrade from the original Apple Watch and certainly not from series 4. Perhaps series 6 will have more to offer. Or maybe 7,8,or nine.
customer_reviews.author: john barker

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch Series 5....
customer_reviews.text: It’s Just Amazing What It Can Do Plus Tells You The Time....😀😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Prentice Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great for Health and Heart monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love the new 5 it is excellent especially for your heart monitoring.. expensive so buy the aluminium one and save some money it’s still the same inside
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Always on immediately turn off.
customer_reviews.text: Fab but prefer not use to always on. I think rise to wake is more appealing to me. But nice to have in certain situations.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Trzcinski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smart Watch good battery Life.
customer_reviews.text: Great smart watch like the always on display. Also compass is good for hiking. Battery life better than advertised getting 24 hours before charge not 18 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Very useful but not needed.
customer_reviews.text: Battery only lasts a day so is hard to wear all day and use to sleep track if you’re away from the charger, only gripe though as it’s a very handy tool to stop the need for your phone to be in your hand constantly, It does charge nice and fast though and would advise getting a stand to keep all your Apple accessories in 1 place and safe. If you have the spare money, I’d advise getting one if, if not, you could easily do without, as it’s more of a luxury than an necessity. Dictaphone to reply to messages is good but the trackpad for typing is very small and harder to use with your left hand
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Howie

customer_reviews.title: Like Buying from a dodgy guy at pub
customer_reviews.text: This watch came but was locked to it being used it had someone else’s Apple ID associated with it, I would have thought Amazon would make sure it was ready to use, turns out useless it was a present too so very upsetting, I won’t be buying pre owned again I did think I could trust amazon as it’s described as (as new ) very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Robbie J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor - description did not warrant the goods
customer_reviews.text: Face is very badly scuffed and scratched this was not mentioned in the description, considering it was only £20 cheaper than a brand new one
customer_reviews.author: Ian Bates

customer_reviews.title: Funky and fun, not cheap, not essential by any means
customer_reviews.text: I do like this, and especially the connection to your IPhone. I mean, how cool do you look answering your phone by speaking into your watch when your hands are full! Bit pricey, but syncs well with phone and apps work fine. Battery life poor - I have the “always on” feature off, and get 2 days per charge. Overall it’s a 4 star item for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniac

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Gadget ( Battery could be better )
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding gadget, very adjustable in all ways, screens are highly changeable to suit yourself and so you can have it setup exactly as you choose. But with everything set up and working a treat, the battery is only lasting 24-36 hours! I’ve reduced the brightness and turned off some notifications (which defeats the object) to see if this helps but if it doesn’t then it will become a proper annoyance. At the moment, I’m really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat it, take phone calls, email alerts, text messages, just brilliant. Being able to respond to WhatsApp messages by voice is just so clever, hit reply, microphone and start talking. How good is that! Tells you the time as well....
customer_reviews.author: nick stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant upgrade from the series 1
customer_reviews.text: My first Apple Watch lasted about 5 years and I had no issues with it, however more recently it has begun to show its age, slowing down and not receiving new updates, so I thought it was time for an upgrade. Moving to the series 5 I have noticed much better battery life and some brilliant new features, so I’m very glad that I upgraded!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Superb iPhone integration, Apple Pay and loads of handy features like timers, alarms etc.
customer_reviews.text: Superb product. Brilliant integration with iphone. Apple Pay and fuss free TFL charging. Charged daily allows sleep tracking and constant monitoring if your heart. Great for finding your iPhone in a hurry answering the phone quickly reading messages and replying. Love it. Maybe not worth twice the price of the 3rd gen watch though!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not looked back since purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I put off buying an Apple Watch for such a long time but I finally bit the bullet and purchased one and I’ve not looked back. It’s very comfortable to wear you hardly notice it’s there, it’s very easy to use as it follows the same simplistic layouts as other Apple products. The battery life isn’t the best but with what the watch can/is doing it’s not the end of the world and it charges us very quickly it’s hardly an inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: James Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Awful service from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch and all good, until I realised that it had an issue with accessing notifications at times. Went to apple store and they said that there is a hardware problem. I contacted amazon and they insisted that I should send it to their repair centre. I am sending it there, with paperwork in the package (the diagnostic from apple and all), and I received it after more than 2 weeks back, without notice, with a note saying that everything is fine with it. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from Original Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a replacement for my series 0 Apple watch which was starting to struggle. This latest watch is much more useable and doesn't lag as much as the original, which is to be expected. Yes, they're expensive and I wish the battery would last longer but like the iPhone, they're leagues better than any competitors equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: great product well built simple to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Adam Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My partner bought me this watch & I love it. It’s easy to use, has so many functions and is very helpful with things to do with my health. I love all the tracking it does. You can use it for so much, it looks good, comfy to wear too.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Blair

customer_reviews.title: Looks is not everything
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is just annoying. Recharging is necessary every night even without intense use. Quite disappointing for the price you pay but it is nice and stylish for sure. Another apple product thats overpriced but at least looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Anelia

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF TIME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look elsewhere or at another edition/ link on here to buy one. Order this with next day and I received a potentially stolen item that had activation lock enabled.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Fuming!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in advance due to the pandemic for my sons 18th birthday present.. he opened it.. Started to set it up and then it started to overheat and the screen went green with lines down it.. couldn’t even switch it off!! Massively disappointed! An 18th he won’t forget.. and for all the wrong reasons.. thank you.. not! Watch returned now let’s see how long the refund takes! Where’s my refund??????
customer_reviews.author: Dee owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple Watch ⌚️.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch and was really glad I was able to buy this direct from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: s boreham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality xx
customer_reviews.text: Excellent works alot better than other android smartwatches apple watch is the best watch out there battery life is quite good I'm using it for my activities and for music and so on very fast start up and usage also I barely used my iPhone only if necessary so yeah alot better than android smartwatches big time xx
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: A gift from husband to himself!
customer_reviews.text: My husband drank the Apple CoolAid a very long time ago. His first watch was damaged and he treated himself again to a new one! Excellent products every single time!
customer_reviews.author: Dayo Oluwole

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite electronics.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Apple Watches (the version with cellular and the version without cellular) from Amazon over six months ago. One for my own use and the other for a friend. I think series 5 and series 4 are pretty much the same. Bought two new ones because the screen can always be on and I need a watch with cellular. It does motivate me to exercise and help me to organise my daily life. The only downside of the watch is that the battery life is too short. It needs to be continuously charged.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Well
customer_reviews.text: I switched over from Fitbit and I’m kind of regretting it this is more of a smart watch then a fitness watch. I am not impressed with the battery life but the main redeeming quality is that it is linked to quite a lot of apps on my iPhone. This means that I look at my phone less which is great
customer_reviews.author: S Oshin

customer_reviews.title: Buy, buy, buy.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing other to say other than wow. I have come back to apple after a few years with samsung. I had the samsung galaxy watch, this blows it out of the water. I can find no fault with it so far. Its an incredible piece of kit and the make and design is pure quality Just treat yourself and buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Karlsberg

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas present for my mother and it was broken, the bezel was jammed in causing it to constantly scroll thee menus. Had to take it to Apple to stop it fixed and they will have it for 3 weeks not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: chris mccullough

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big watch fan so it took me a while to decide if the Apple Watch was something I’d want to use. Now that I’ve got one I wear it everyday and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good apps make the iWatch and the link with your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Would like more battery life like the Fitbit watches. However always wanted a iWatch and I have apple everything else. Like all the apps and the faces you can use. Like the alerting especially for meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bloomfield

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but it doesn’t come cheap
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy having an Apple Watch and appreciate it’s seamless integration with the rest of apples product lines. My main usage is as a watch and activity tracker. I upgraded because my series 1 had become too slow.
customer_reviews.author: AdrenalineLuke

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Apple Watch. It’s a great tool and I’d never be without. I do find the battery life on this one to be a lot less than my old one. Occasionally I feel excercise tracking could be more accurate but overall a fantastic watch that does exactly what I need. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Had a Fitbit before. This is definitely better. The health app, the activity app, and all the other apps that sync with it - just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Afshan Chatoo

customer_reviews.title: useful and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This hour is great. It is very fun to use. I don't need a phone for notifications anymore. You can use many different screens by swiping. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Ozkan ASLAN

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and well designed. Definitely an upgrade from other smart watch brands - only sacrifice is the battery life. It tends to last around 18 hours, if you want to track your sleep I’d advise charging more often.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Thought about getting one for years, the always on display sold it to me and really happy with it. Lots of great apps for shopping, fitness, work, etc and battery has never given up on me....wouldn’t be without it now.
customer_reviews.author: Archangel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my Apple Watch, wish I’d got one before !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade from Fitbit Ionic.
customer_reviews.text: Brought for the wife. She loves it and is a fairly major upgrade from the Fitbit ionic. Battery lasts about 2 days tops other than that a brilliant little piece of wearable tech.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch to combine an ordinary watch and a well known heartbeat monitoring device. It measures that, as well as what it was 1 minute ago. The app reads like a health report, a daily/hourly. It's a fantastic watch plus!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this series 5 apple watch to replace my series 2. What a difference! Amazing battery life, faster, more responsive, better tracking when exercising.. the list goes on. Love it so much, I feel naked without wearing it. 100% genuine apple product. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Borny

customer_reviews.title: Loving this Apple watch
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted one for a long time so my husband bought it for my birthday. I am a ‘gadget girl’ and love anything techie! Really enjoying all the features on the watch. It’s a fun thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: Signpost

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Apple products may or may not be for you and that’s fine. If you do like Apple products and looking to buy into the smart watch world, the new Apple Watch is a pioneer amongst all. Sleek, clean and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: harley grundy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Love my Apple Watch after getting introduced to the Apple world about a year ago was a Samsung Customer before for about five years. Would never go back great and reliable service from Apple. Will definitely update my watch one-day love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first smart watch I've ever had and can honestly say it’s brilliant. From answering phone calls to sending messages using voice control, the amount of stuff it does is great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected; pretty decent strap, thought it might be cheap looking for the price, but I’m impressed. Looks great quality, stands out as good and is comfy. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brixey

customer_reviews.title: A lockdown purchase....
customer_reviews.text: I did wonder when I ordered this whether I really needed it or whether it was an extravagant lockdown purchase! I’m so glad I bought it, it helps me track my movement during the day and has plenty of great compatible apps. I’m able to keep an eye on my notifications at work when I don’t want my phone to be out so I don’t miss anything important. The battery life is excellent. I don’t think I needed it but I’m really happy I have it and thoroughly recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: The perfect ungrade for the wife. She loves her apple watch. This new one willl give her more options. Cannot wait to see her face Christmas morning
customer_reviews.author: derek booker

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today my partner was very happy with it, he had a Fitbit that died on him so this is his first Apple Watch Some great apps including ECG
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: Good for healthcare
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mum for the fall sensor, gives us peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: Shamsul Hoque

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Apple Watch, what is there to say
customer_reviews.text: It a Apple product so we all know what it’s like. That said it surprising how much bigger the screen is compared to the series 3.
customer_reviews.author: Ck1

customer_reviews.title: Apple watch series 5
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife, she absolutely loves this watch. It has all the features she wanted, fully charged it easily lasts two days before requiring a recharge, she doesnt normally wear a watch a lot but this one she only takes off when it needs recharging.
customer_reviews.author: MR G J MOXHAM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: Never like wearing a watch but have to say this is so much more than a watch it is not the same. I love the functionality and it is a great addition to my Apple collection
customer_reviews.author: Kamil

customer_reviews.title: Convert
customer_reviews.text: My Garmin came end of life and fancied a change. Does everything you would expect from an Apple product and more.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: More than a watch
customer_reviews.text: Never like wearing a watch but have to say this is so much more than a watch it is not the same. I love the functionality and it is a great addition to my Apple collection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any owner
customer_reviews.text: Protects your Apple Watch and you wouldn’t even know it’s on there once fitted. There’s no noticeable change in the way you interact with your device but this little cover keeps the the whole thing looking like it’s brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: The best smart watch you can get. It is expensive but it’s a high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amaan Ashiq

customer_reviews.title: Not very compatible with WhatsApp or WeChat. Forget about it
customer_reviews.text: Problems if you use WeChat and/or WhatsApp. Message notifications still work but there is no call notifications on Apple Watch for these two apps! 80% of my calls are from these two apps! Who still only uses the Phone app to call others?!
customer_reviews.author: Abc

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish battery
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, battery life is useless. You’d think for the price of the watch it wouldn’t need to be charged everyday. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Correct time every time.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the watch do all I want even fitted my favourite strap and put a screen cover on
customer_reviews.author: Mr H J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best Apple watch  ever !
customer_reviews.text: Apple products are always at the top! Happy with the Apple Watch. Slightly expensive but value for money. It has the premium quality look and design. I would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jak1

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This Watch is stunning and has such great features. The silver Watch with the white strap look very chic.
customer_reviews.author: mrs Banks

customer_reviews.title: Good gadget to have
customer_reviews.text: The wrist strap I got with the watch is a bit of a pain to put on. It works great notifications/calls come through as they should. Battery last about 1-1-1/2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted an Apple Watch so when I had the money I just had to get this, I upgraded from a Fitbit which has pros and cons but overall I prefer the Apple Watch as it can do so much more
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Prichard

customer_reviews.title: A great upgrade from Apple
customer_reviews.text: Love Apple watches and this was an upgrade from a series 2. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Mickeyt

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and tracker
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Replaced other faulty tracker. Would recommend Also got screen and shroud protector Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself does what it says it does. Would be nice to have longer battery life but it doesn’t claim to be much more than we find during normal usage.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro1st

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Present for the Mrs! Great upgrade from Fitbit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it! Looks class on her wrist and the functions are so much better than those on my Fitbit. I'll be buying another Apple Watch Series 5 for myself to replace my Fitbit. 10/10 as always from Amazon/Apple in terms of service/delivery/packaging etc. Would 110% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Basdeo-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the Apple Watch 5 is - does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten I.

customer_reviews.title: More accurate then fitbit. Less useful
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t reccomend, not sure why people buy this thing it really doesn’t do much
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I mean it’s Apple and their products are great. As always, more expensive than the competition though.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Good keeps me moving chirps at me when I have a text
customer_reviews.author: JIMMY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smart Watch
customer_reviews.text: Does all I need well. No regrets buying this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor B.

customer_reviews.title: Super little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bit of kit. Great for running, swimming & everything else you can imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Warden

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: What is not to like? Maybe just the battery life. One cloud on an otherwise sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Lord L

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased I decided to treat myself to one of these! Great for running and many other things
customer_reviews.author: Grets

customer_reviews.title: A great watch
customer_reviews.text: A really great watch and it is very easy to use and fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Top of the range, practically a computer on your wrist
customer_reviews.text: Can quickly check incoming calls or memos, ideal as a sports watch/step counter
customer_reviews.author: Brian Muckleston

customer_reviews.title: My wife is so happy
customer_reviews.text: My wife so happy and I will buy for my sell later
customer_reviews.author: cihan yilmaz

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth the money?
customer_reviews.text: For the money I expected more. I have always found Apple products intuitive, yet there are aspects of this that are sadly lacking
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I have just bought this for my partner she really loves it. Wears it everyday. I have a series 3. Contemplating getting the 5.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur power

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch 5
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with watch wear all the time great 👍
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Swann

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Christmas gift for my partner, he loves it and won’t stop playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: HazeKing12

customer_reviews.title: Good but 3rd gen is just as good
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory but the 3rd gen one is exactly the same but it’s without the always on display and for half the price it’s maybe the way forward
customer_reviews.author: harry boon

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch but the strap is faulty.
customer_reviews.text: The apple iPhone STRAP IS FAULTY, the Iwatch is fine tho. Don’t know how to get a replacement. Please if you can advise me.
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was saving up for an Apple Watch a DJ was going to purchase the 4 but decided on the 5 as it was discounted and so glad I did helps me stay in touch and great fitness software.
customer_reviews.author: Olive2018

customer_reviews.title: Wife is over the moon
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wife as a wedding present, she’s over the moon with it. I will buy myself one soon😃
customer_reviews.author: simon payne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love the always on display, the transisions are super smooth and it is clearly faster and smoother than Series 3. The strap feels great and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Patrik Tandari

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MYST GET
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed this wasn’t what I expected I thought it would be cheap but it comes with all the packaging from Apple perfect condition it’s basically like you bought it from apple
customer_reviews.author: Solat C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I was debating for ages on whether to buy one. In the end I just did it. And I love it!! Only down side is the battery isn’t amazing. But everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t got used to it yet!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t quite got used to the benefits this watch has! Probably does more than I realise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a anniversary gift for my husband and he really loved my gift. And he was really surprised while receiving this gift. Moreover it’s better than I expect excellent packing and good condition
customer_reviews.author: Ajeena

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ITTTTT
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical at first because my friend had one and said they are novelty and it’s not worth it but I find it very helpful and motivating to reach my targets
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: It great
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need great product as always with apple you get what u pay for
customer_reviews.author: mr d p austin

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch
customer_reviews.text: Love it helped push me to walk more great all rounder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAB
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a gift. Great smart watch and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal friquiche

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC WATCH
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic watch would never use any other type of watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS, 44mm) - Space Gray Aluminum Case with Black Sport Band
